name: wonder-skin

effect.sun-moon: Non-damaging moves have exactly 50% base accuracy against this Pokémon.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Non-damaging moves have exactly 50% base accuracy against this Pokémon.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Non-damaging moves have exactly 50% base accuracy against this Pokémon.

short_effect: Lowers incoming non-damaging moves' base accuracy to exactly 50%.

flavor_text.sun-moon: Makes status moves more likely to miss.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Makes status moves more likely to miss.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Makes status moves more likely to miss.
